name: Brave Nine
description:
Fabian, the Karian Empire's greatest warlord and most venerable nobleman,
was joined by six wicked companions known as the "Six Devils."

Together, they murdered Altair II, the emperor, but he was soon defeated by the Imperial Army and killed in battle.

7 years later...

Under a false identity, Fabian's son sets out to uncover the truth behind his father's death!
The Emperor Killer. The Moon that Eclipsed the Sun. The Master of the Six Devils. The Name that Cannot Be Spoken...

Will Fabian's son be able to uncover the truth behind the Day of the Eclipse?

■ Engage in intense Real-Time Turn-Based Combat Against Players Worldwide

Distinguish yourself while battling players from around the globe!

■ Experience Stunning Artwork and Animations

Over 300 unique mercenaries with unique skills

■ Embark on a Gripping Storyline

Delve into captivating chapters filled with engaging storylines, revealing the depths of a mesmerizing fantasy world with every episode.

■ Challenge Your Tactical Skills in Deep Gameplay

Build the ultimate formation to defeat your opponents and demonstrate your mastery
